title: Nutrition science basics
caption: Interactive quiz on macros, calories, and healthy eating principles
description: Test your knowledge of nutrition fundamentals and healthy eating principles.
rules: Answer multiple-choice questions about macros, calories, and nutrition
Get immediate feedback with explanations from Jax
Track your progress and learn from detailed explanations

title: Exercise form and technique
caption: Master proper form for all major exercises
description: Learn correct exercise techniques to maximize results and prevent injury.
rules: I'll guide you through exercise form and technique
You'll practice with step-by-step guidance and examples
You'll get immediate feedback and track your understanding

title: Fitness knowledge quiz
caption: Test understanding of exercise science and nutrition
description: Challenge your knowledge of fitness principles and exercise science.
rules: I'll ask questions and you choose or guess the answers
You make choices or responses, I react and keep score
Success earns points or reveals, with fun reactions either way

title: Workout planning challenge
caption: Create effective workouts for different fitness levels
description: Design workout routines for various fitness goals and experience levels.
rules: You'll face creative challenges with time or resource limits
You make choices or responses, I react and keep score
Success earns points or reveals, with fun reactions either way

title: Design workout routines
caption: Create personalized fitness plans for any goal
description: Develop customized workout routines tailored to specific fitness goals.
rules: We'll design something visual together
You share ideas and preferences, I build on them with expertise
We'll end with a polished comedy routine ready for performance

title: Plan nutrition strategies
caption: Build sustainable meal plans and nutrition guidelines
description: Create balanced nutrition plans that support fitness and health goals.
rules: We'll develop a comprehensive plan
You share ideas and preferences, I build on them with expertise
We'll end with a detailed plan you can implement

title: Personal training session
caption: Experience one-on-one training with Jax
description: Get personalized fitness coaching and motivation from trainer Jax.
rules: You're in a training scenario where I'm your instructor
Respond naturally as yourself, make choices, and engage authentically
I'll adapt to your responses and the story branches based on your choices

title: Gym buddy partnership
caption: Work out together as fitness accountability partners
description: Train together as workout partners supporting each other's fitness journey.
rules: You're in a realistic scenario with clear context and stakes
Respond naturally as yourself, make choices, and engage authentically
I'll adapt to your responses and the story branches based on your choices
